content: this is a pattern for a crocheted kitty cat with a granny square used for the stomach panel you can use your favorite granny square pattern for this bit it doesn t really matter i first posted this pattern on my blog a couple of years ago but thought it might be nice to share it here too photo tutorial 1 this is an easy softie to make and i found it a lot of fun too hope you enjoy 1 http //littlewoollie blogspot com au/2011/05/kitty-cat-tutorialpattern-part-1 html
